messages.subject: FW: For those near Pouslbo WA
messages.msgSnippet: I just discovered that Miracle Ranch has a bunch of homeschooling activities. Horsemanship (various levels), animal science, marksmanship, sign language, golf,
messages.messageBody:
I just discovered that Miracle Ranch has a bunch of homeschooling
activities. Horsemanship (various levels), animal science, marksmanship,
sign language, golf, pioneer living skills, etc. All classes are 2 hours
long, between 9:00-4:00, once a week and cost $80. But the more classes
taken the lowers the cost (ex. 2 sisters taking 3 classes each would be
$300). And there's a fireside room for mom/dad and other siblings. Autumn
session starts next Wed...Sept 27th thru Nov 16th . Spring session Jan 24th
thru Mar 22nd.

Note: Christian camp, for girls only (sorry guys).

http://www.cristacamps.com

for a brochure or more info, email: information@...

---Valerie

PS Sorry if you receive multiple postings.
